name: Compandent, inc.
overview:
Compandent was founded by word leader experts in DSP, telecom, and signal compression. Compandent creates leading-edge innovative DSP algorithms and implementations for your next generation telecom products, including voice compression, audio, video, multimedia, packet networks, baseband wireless, and RF systems. It provides unique solutions to the telecom world, and to the world of secure voice.

The Compandent participated in the R&D of the MELPe voice compression standard, and is the only company today that actively supports and keeps development around it, and ports it to new platforms. Compandent has done MELPe contracts for NSA, developed the official testbed for the NSA & NATO. The company develops hardware and software solutions related to the MELPe.

The company license its software and IP. It also provide cutting edge custom solutions. Our solutions run on numerous platforms including Linux, Android, Windows PC, iOS, Mac X OS, DSP, ARM, PowerPC, GHS, etc.
